description: Newcomer Stacy Stax shows a lot of promise as we put her through the watery paces here at WB. She is sprayed, flogged, dunked and tied tightly in her debut. She takes it like a champ. The predicament bondage scene, in which she must escape by following instructions and finding keys, was a lot of fun and quite sexy too. Stacy found out she has a bit of a water phobia in scene four, but she held out pretty well and even wants to come back to try again. You were a lot of fun Stacy and we hope to see you again soon!
title: Stacey Stax
